name: Name of the weapon
image: The image of the weapon. Usually WeaponName.png
mastery_level: Minimum mastery level required to equip
noise_level: Numeric value for noise (do not fill in if you do not know what it is).
recoil: Recoil of the aim reticle per shot
physical_damage: Base net damage for the following three
elemental_damage_type: Base damage type (only use if elemental)

charge.physical_damage: Base net damage for the following three
charge.elemental_damage_type: Base damage type (only use if elemental)
charge.stat_proc: Chance to proc elemental effects on charge attacks

conclave: Base Conclave rating for the weapon
polarities: The polarities that the weapon has

extra.name: Name of the weapon
extra.image: The image of the weapon. Usually WeaponName.png
extra.mastery_level: Minimum mastery level required to equip
extra.physical_damage: Base net damage for the following three
extra.elemental_damage_type: Base damage type (only use if elemental)

charge.physical_damage: Base net damage for the following three
charge.elemental_damage_type: Base damage type (only use if elemental)
charge.cleave: Base swing speed for charge attacks
charge.stat_proc: charge attack stat proc IF different

slam.physical_damage: Base net damage for the following three
slam.elemental_damage_type: Base damage type (only use if elemental)

slide.physical_damage: Base net damage for the following three
slide.elemental_damage_type: Base damage type (only use if elemental)

extra.finisher_damage: Damage dealt when attacking a knocked-down target.
extra.max_targets: Maximum amount of targets the weapon can hit in a single attack
extra.conclave: Base Conclave rating for the weapon
extra.polarities: The polarities that the weapon has
